definition: to play with/to wield/to act (cool etc)/to display (a skill, one's temper etc)
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: Bill, stop screwing around, tell me what the hell is going on.
sentences.chinese: 别再耍花枪了，告诉我到底怎么回事。

definition: to show off with clever talk/big-headed/a smart-ass
to act in a play/to put on a play
to talk glibly/to talk big/to be all talk
(old) to fight on the leitai/(fig.) to enter a contest
flowery of fist with fancy footwork (idiom)/highly embellished and ineffectual/fancy but impractical skills/all show and no go/pugilistic wankery
lit. to wield the broadsword in the presence of Lord Guan (idiom)/fig. to make a fool of oneself by showing off in front of an expert
pinyin: Guan1 gong1 mian4 qian2 shua3 da4 dao1

definition: to put on airs/to be ostentatious
to put on airs/to assume great airs
